Q8. ARP Identifier on Stack Overflow

Would you find it useful to have an ARP identifier ‚Äî beyond existing Stack Overflow tags ‚Äî that explicitly marks posts as architecture-related? For example, this could be, for example a dedicated label, an icon, or a visual marker distinguishing architecture-related posts from general programming posts. (5-point Likert scale)

column36:
Q27. Architecture Issue-Solution Pairs Extractor on Stack Overflow

Would you find it useful to have an architectural issue-solution pair extractor when searching for and reading posts on Stack Overflow? This could be, for example, a key sentence highlighter, a structured summary, or an automated annotation that identifies and extracts key architectural issues and their corresponding solutions within a post.  (5-point Likert scale)
